称号或别名: The Cold Goddess、The Queen of Cold and Frost、Queen of Frozen Tears、The Frostmaiden、Brittle Maiden、Frost Sprite Queen、Lady Frostkiss、Lady Icekiss、Storm-bringer、Soverign of Summers Lost、General of Winter's War、Winter's Womb、Icedawn
